name: iHomma_V3
0:
”Alexa, turn on the bed light please”
”Alexa, set the bed light to red please”
”Alexa, dim the bed light please”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: You can use this skill to control the light from our company. For example, if your device name is 'bed light', you can say : "Alexa , turn on the bed light." "Alexa, set the bed light to red." " Alexa, set the bed light to fifty percent." The light will turn on , change color and change brightness as you want. Click start to use the skill, enter the registered APP account which you downloaded from our product package.
